items.summary: Agent-first workflow and design rails for building X07 programs with the released toolchain (no repo-only dependencies). Canonical execution is via `x07 run`.
Produce distributable native executables (normal CLI ABI) via `x07 bundle`.
Canonical concurrency patterns in X07 (defasync + task.* + chan.bytes.*), including sandbox constraints.
Emit C output and a C header for embedding X07 in C/C++ via `x07 build --emit-c-header`.
Canonically format X07 x07AST JSON files using `x07 fmt` (check/write) with a machine-readable JSON report.
Canonical streaming I/O patterns in X07 using std.io / std.io.bufread and world adapters.
Canonical X07 language + stdlib reference (mirrors `x07 guide` output) for end-user skill packs.
Lint X07 x07AST JSON and converge via quickfixes (`x07 fix`) or explicit JSON Patch (`x07 ast apply-patch`).
Expert backend for run-os / run-os-sandboxed execution via x07-os-runner. Prefer `x07 run --profile os` / `x07 run --profile sandbox`.
Manage X07 project dependencies and lockfiles for reproducible builds (lock, publish). Designed for autonomous agents.
Canonical execution front door for X07 programs (run-os / run-os-sandboxed), producing runner reports.
Run project tests using the X07 test harness (x07 test), producing a machine-readable JSON report.
